title: Bug 14197: Changes Occur Immediately When Removing Working Set
description: When removing a working set, changes take effect immediately.
OB: Upon creating a working set with one project and selecting it, the package view is filtered.
EB: Changes should not immediately take effect upon removing a working set.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it in the package view (filter applied). 2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, then delete the first one.
